title: Strengthening Practical Machine Learning Competencies: Blended Learning Design for Enhancing Group Essay Evaluation Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic competency in online collaboration tools
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain three or more group essay evaluation criteria.
Learners can analyze online group activity data with 80% or higher accuracy using the Google Docs collaboration system.
Learners can develop a consistent evaluation framework by comparing assessment results from multiple evaluators (peers/instructors).
Learners can derive at least three improvement points for the group collaboration process by utilizing version control history.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
